Impose surface freshwater flux anomalies to the ocean (including the contribution from runoff change), calculated from the ensemble mean of the 1pctCO2 simulations at the time of CO2 doubling.

keywords: FAFMIP, Tier 1, waterFAF, surface freshwater flux anomaly
long_name: control plus perturbative surface flux of water into ocean
rationale: For comparison with the FAFMIP surface heat flux anomaly experiment.

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 1850 for 70 years
requirements.label: 1850-1851 70yrs

requirements.description: Impose surface freshwater flux anomalies to the ocean (including the contribution from runoff change), calculated from the ensemble mean of the 1pctCO2 simulations at the time of CO2 doubling.  Surface flux anomalies (a function of longitude, latitude and time of year) are to remain constant throughout the experiment.   Note that the fluxes themselves are not replaced because this would typically cause a very large climate drift and possible instability.
requirements.keywords: FAFMIP, 1pctCO2, freshwater flux, 2xCO2, at CO2 doubling
requirements.label: 1pctCO2FreshWaterFluxAnomalyAtDoubling

requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
